about_the_game:
Prepare to be consumed by Mirrored Phantoms, a chilling descent into a decaying mannequin factory where reality itself has fractured. This first-person psychological horror experience preys on your deepest fears, immersing you in an unsettling atmosphere where the line between what is real and what is imagined blurs with every haunting step on your journey to escape.

 

The decaying walls whisper secrets of a dark past, while the lifeless eyes of countless mannequins follow your every move. Explore the oppressive corridors, piecing together the mystery of the shattered mirror shards that hold the key to your escape. But be warned, the silence is deceptive. There are things that lurk in these halls that never want you to leave, and they are always listening.

 

Steel your nerves for chilling encounters that will test your sanity. Uncover the sinister history of the factory, decipher the clues etched into its decaying walls, and confront the phantoms that haunt your every waking moment. Dare to escape the clutches of this nightmarish reality, or risk being forever trapped within its mirrored depths.

 

Key Features:

  • A Shattered Reality: Descend into a nightmarish mannequin factory where the walls warp and reality itself is a twisted reflection. Prepare for an unsettling experience where your senses will be challenged and your sanity strained.

  • Psychological Terror: Confront the chilling dread that seeps from every corner of this decaying world.  The ever-present gaze of lifeless eyes, the unsettling silence, and the unnerving feeling of being constantly watched will prey on your deepest fears.

  • Unveiling the Mystery: Explore the oppressive environment, piecing together the dark history of the factory and the curse that binds you to it. Search for clues hidden within the shadows, solve the enigma of the mirror shards, and uncover the truth behind the horrors that haunt you.

content_descriptors.notes:
Visually, Mirrored Phantoms contains depictions of manneqins without clothing, which can appear as nudity.

Thematically, the game is intended to scare and startle players and attempts to make the player feel anxious and scared throughout the game.

Explore a deeply atmospheric world, solve the mystery of the mirror shards, and survive the terrors that await in this slow-burning, first-person horror experience.
